Hi folks,
Is there anyway to configure a WinJS Windows Phone 8 project to allow TypeScript files to be added? I've configured the project file to include the TypeScript targets file and the relevant properties and I can compile TypeScript files just fine. However, any file marked as TypeScriptCompile is not visible in the WinJS project and I can't use the Add Item dialog to add additional files (currently renaming .js to .ts by hand).
Any ideas?
Thanks,
Dean
I've same problem trying to add a Typescript file a Web project or Web Application new project!
JSProj does not support TypeScript in VS2012 Update2. There are a set of known limitation in the JSProj like add new file, and build support. These should be fixed in our upcoming release.
